sentences.sContent: Marked by utter benignity ; resembling or befitting an angel or saint.
sentences.sContent_eng: Marked by utter benignity ; resembling or befitting an angel or saint.
sentences.sCn: 以非常仁慈为特点；类似于或者适合于天使或者圣人。

sentences.sContent: He looked upon me with so much humor and benignity that I could scarcely contain my satisfaction.
sentences.sContent_eng: He looked upon me with so much humor and benignity that I could scarcely contain my satisfaction.
sentences.sCn: 他是多么幽默地仁慈地瞧着我，我简直没办法抑制心头的满足。

sentences.sContent: However the social insurance system of justice still needs benignity to provide value guidance and humanistic environment for its operation.
sentences.sContent_eng: However the social insurance system of justice still needs benignity to provide value guidance and humanistic environment for its operation.
sentences.sCn: 然而，正义的社会保障制度，仍需仁慈为其运行提供价值引导和人文环境。

words.tran: 良性的；仁慈的；有益的；和蔼的
